REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Designates the members of the opioid settlement board as public officers for the purposes of the public officers law
Summary: Designates the members of the opioid settlement board as public officers for the purposes of the public officers law.
